title: Until Kayla
description: Kayla Mackey I was ready to run from my loss and find something to make me breathe again. I didn't know it could happen. Until Jase.   Jase Riding I felt desolate and alone when I lost the best part of me. I didn't know where I would find someone to mend the broken parts in me. That was... Until Kayla.  We met, and with a brief hello and a hushed profanity, we were hooked. I swear we heard thunder when our eyes met.  Boom. And our lives were changed forever.
author: C.C. Monroe
